Regulation Name(s): Fully Automated Short-Term Incubation Cycle Antimicrobial Susceptibility Devices
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for VITEK® 2 Compact automated antimicrobial susceptibility testing system for isolated clinical colonies.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended to be used with VITEK® 2 AST Cards for automated susceptibility testing of isolated colonies from clinically significant aerobic gram-negative bacilli, Staphylococcus spp., Enterococcus spp., Streptococcus agalactiae, and S. pneumoniae as a laboratory aid in determining in vitro susceptibility to antimicrobial agents.
